contentrichtext.text: {{other uses}} {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Geer |picture=Geer 051017 (7).JPG |picture-legend= |map=Geer Liège Belgium Map.png |map-legend=Location of Geer in the province of Liège |arms= |flag= |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-LG}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Waremme|Waremme]] |nis=64029 |pyramid-date |0-19= |20-64 |65 |foreigners= |foreigners-date |mayor=Laurence Tournay-Kinon (independent) |majority=independent, [[Reformist Movement|MR]], [[Centre Démocrate Humaniste|CDH]] |postal-codes=4250, 4252-4254 |telephone-area=019 |web=[http://www.geer.be/ www.geer.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=40 |lon_deg=05 |lon_min=10 }} '''Geer''' is a [[Wallonia|Walloon]] [[municipality]] of [[Belgium]] in [[Liege (province)|Province of Liege]]. On January 1, 2006 Geer had a total population of 2,854. The total area is 23.62 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 121 inhabitants per km². Geer lies along the upper course of the river [[Jeker]], which is called ''Geer'' in French. [[Image:Geer 051017 (3).JPG|thumb|left|Town hall.|250px]] ==References== {{reflist}} {{Liege municipalities}} [[Category:Municipalities of Liège (province)]] {{Liege-geo-stub}}
